279480.「おお 我がドルワームの恩人 <pc>よ！ \n よくぞ 参った！:
Oh, Dolworm's benefactor, <pc>! You
have done well!

279481.「む 見慣れぬ顔があるな。そちらの女性は……？:
Hm? I don't recognize her. Who is
that woman...?

279482.「ユーライザと申します。こちらに いらっしゃる\n 勇者の盟友にして アストルテ:
My name is Yuliza. I am an ally of the Hero
who is here, and I serve the great hero of
Astoltia, <pc>.

279483.「そ そうか。\n ちと 持ち上げすぎな気もするが\n 確かに その通りじゃのう:
I see. I think I'm overstating things a
little, but you're absolutely right...

279484.「本題に入ろう。このドルワーム……\n いや ドワチャッカ大陸全土に\n 大きな:
Let me cut to the chase. Dolworm...or
rather, all of Dwachakka Continent, is in
grave danger.

279485.「近ごろ ドワチャッカ大陸の中央に位置する\n カルサドラ火山の活動が\n 急激:
Recently, Calsadora Volcano, located in the
center of the Dwachakka Continent, has been
experiencing a rapid increase in activity.

279486.「我が王立研究院が 保有している\n 火山の観測データと くらべてみても\n 異:
This is nothing short of an anomaly when
compared to the volcano observation data held
by the Royal Institution of Research.

279487.「私が計算したところ 近いうちに\n カルサドラ火山は 歴史上\n 類を見ないほ:
I calculate that in the near future, Calsadora
Volcano will erupt in a manner unprecedented
in its history...

279488.「……この大噴火が 起こってしまえば\n ドワチャッカ大陸全土が 火の海と化し\:
...If this eruption were to occur, the entire
Dwachakka Continent would be turned into a sea
of fire, and the damage would be enormous.

279489.「この異常事態に対し 対策を練るため\n カルサドラ火山に 急きょ\n 調査隊を:
A survey team was dispatched to Calsadora
Volcano in a hurry in order to find a solution
to this unusual situation. However...

279490.「火口付近に 派遣した調査隊が\n 何日経っても 帰ってこないんだ……。\n 彼:
We sent a survey team to the crater and they
haven't returned in days... something must
have happened to them!

279491.「……これは おそらく 悪神と化した\n 英雄のしわざです。急ぎ カルサドラ火山:
...Perhaps this is the work of a hero turned
fiend. Let's hurry to Calsadora Volcano and
look for clues to the fiend.

279492.「おお！ カルサドラ火山におもむき\n 事態の解決に 協力してくれるというのか。:
Oh! You are willing to go to Calsadora Volcano
to help us solve the problem. Thank God!

279494.「チ チリ王女！ 何をおっしゃるのです！？: Princess Chiri! What are you saying?

279495.「ドゥラ院長 王女は やめてと\n 言ってるでしょう？:
Director Dura, the princess is asking you to
stop.

279496.「カルサドラ火山の異変を 突き止め\n 対策を練るためには 王立研究院の者が\n:
In order to identify what's wrong with Calsadora Volcano and take action, you'll need someone from the Royal Research to accompany
you.

279497.「それに……いつも いつも\n あなたには 助けてもらってばかりだもの。\n 私:
Besides... you've always been so helpful to
me. I want to help you, too.

279498.「それならば 私が同行いたします。\n あまりにも 危険すぎる……！:
Then I will accompany you. It's too
dangerous...!

279499.「そうだよ チリ！\n 君に もしものことがあったら……:
Yes, Chiri! If anything should ever happen to
you...

279500.「危険があるからこそ 研究院の指揮を執れる\n ドゥラ院長や 王の後継者たる ラ:
The danger is why Director Dura, who is in charge of the institute, and Prince Ramiza, the heir to the throne, cannot be allowed to
go into the field.

279501.「私なら 他の研究員と違って\n <pc>とは よく知った仲だし\n 調査も ス:
I think I, unlike the other researchers, know
<pc> well enough to make the
investigation go smoothly.

279502.「私なら 他の研究員と違って\n <pc>とは よく知った仲だし\n 調査も ス:
I think I, unlike the other researchers, know
<pc> well enough to make the
investigation go smoothly.

279503.「……そこまで言うのであれば チリよ。\n 事態の解決のため 彼らに同行すること:
If you insist, Chiri. I order you to go with
them to resolve the situation. I'll be
counting on you.

279504.「ありがとうございます。国王様！: Thank you very much. My king!

279505.「そういうわけで 私も同行するから よろしく！\n 一緒に カルサドラ火山の火口:
That's why I'm going with you, so please!
Let's head to the crater of Calsadora
Volcano together to investigate.

279506.「ラニアッカ断層帯にある オノの祭壇から\n 火口付近に行けるわ。何が起こるか\:
You can get to the crater area from the Axe
Altar in the Raniakka Fault Zone. We never
know what might happen, so let's be careful!

279507.<center>ドワチャッカ大陸を 火の海に……！\n我ら 三闘士の過ちを 正す:
Dwachakka Continent is on fire! We Triads must
right our wrongs.

279508.<center>我が 大願の邪魔は させぬぞ……！\nここから 立ち去れ！:
You will not interfere with my great ambition.
Get out of here!

279509.「道を ふさがれてしまったわ。\n これは ちょっとやそっとじゃ\n 突破できそ:
They blocked the road. I don't think we're
going to get through this in a hurry...

279511.「私の一撃で 破壊できないとは……！: I can't destroy it with a single blow...!

279512.「どうやら 大地の三闘士の強い想いが\n 我々を 拒絶しているようですね。\n:
It appears that the strong feelings of the
Earthen Triad are rejecting us. We cannot
go on like this...

279513.「あれが 伝説の三闘士様……？\n 三闘士様が この大陸を\n 滅ぼそうとしてい:
Is that the legendary Triad? The Triad is
trying to destroy this continent?

279515.「来てくれたんだね。ありがとう……。\n ボク きっと あなたが\n 助けにきて:
You came. Thank you... I was sure you'd come
to save me.

279516.「ここは 悪神となったボクらが 創り出した\n ドワチャッカ大陸を 滅ぼしたいと:
This world is the embodiment of our twisted
desire to destroy the Dwachakka Continent that
we, the fiends, have created...

279517.「呪いで魂をけがされ 悪神となってしまったけど\n わずかに残った 正気の部分を:
Though a curse has wounded my soul and turned me into a fiend, I'm glad I was able to separate what little sanity I had left and
deliver it to you...

279518.「キミは ボクの……\n ドルワームの血を引く子だね。こんなところで\n 子孫に:
You are a child of my Dolworm. I'm so
happy to see my offspring in a place like
this.

279519.「もしかして 古代ドルワーム王国の礎を\n 築いたという 伝説の王……ドルタム様:
Could it be that you are Doltam, the legendary
king who laid the foundation of the ancient
Dolworm Kingdom? My ancestor?

279520.「お願い アクロニア鉱山にいる\n 山神イプチャル様のところへ 行って……。:
Please, go to the mountain god Yppchal at the
Acronia Mine...

279521.「イプチャル様なら きっと\n ボクたちを止める方法を ご存知のはず。\n 呪い:
I'm sure Yppchal will know how to stop us.
Before the curse swallows us all...

279522.「ボクらが 大陸を 焼き尽くしてしまう前に……\n ボクらを……兄ちゃんたちを:
Save us, save my brothers, before we burn the
whole continent to the ground!

279523.「山神イプチャル……。\n アクロニア鉱山に おわすという\n 土地神様のことね:
Yppchal, the Mountain God... the local deity
that resides in the Acronia Mine.

279524.「ここにいても しかたがありません。\n ドルタムの言に従い イプチャル神に\n:
There is no point in staying here. Let's
follow Doltam's advice and go see Yppchal.

279525.「山神イプチャル様は アクロニア鉱山の\n いちばん奥にある 戒めの地に\n い:
I have read in the literature that the
mountain god Yppchal is in the Caution Land at
the far end of the Acronia Mine.

279526.「アクロニア鉱山は ラニアッカ断層帯からも\n アグラニの町からも 行くことがで:
The Acronia Mine is accessible from the
Raniakka Fault Zone and from the Town of
Agrani. Let's hurry up and get there!

279729.<center>カルサドラ火山に宿りし 邪悪なチカラが\nドワチャッカ大陸を 滅:
I sense that the evil power that resides in
Calsadora Volcano is about to bring Dwachakka
Continent to ruin...

279730.「私たちは それを食い止めるため 参りました。\n イプチャル様 ドワチャッカ大:
We are here to stop it. Lord Yppchal, please
lend us your wisdom to save Dwachakka
Continent from destruction...!

279731.<center>うむ。しかし その前に\nそなたたちに カルサドラ火山に巣食う:
Yes. But first, I need to tell you about the
Fiend Triads that lurk in Calsadora Volcano.

279732.<center>彼らの 栄光の果てに\n何が 起こったのかを……。:
What happened to them at the end of their
glory days...

279733.<center>魔物たちが はびこる ドワチャッカ大陸の端\nこのアグラニの地よ:
From this land of Agrani, on the edge of the monster-infested Dwachakka Continent, three young men set out, carved out a path through
the land, and brought their people under the sun.

279734.<center>閃光のオノ 震天の槌 賢哲の盾と呼ばれた若者は\nドワチャッカ大:
The young men called the Flash Axe, the Earth-shaking hammer and the Shield of Wisdom, established three settlements on Dwachakka
Continent and brought an era of happiness and peace to the Dwarves.

279735.<center>閃光王カブは 人々に言った。\n前進せよ。我らが 大地を切り拓い:
Kabu, the Flash King, said to the people, "Go forward. Go forward. For as we have carved out the earth, so shall it be in this world if you
will."

279736.<center>彼らの民は それに従った。\n持ち前の探求心で 発展をとげ\n輝:
Their people followed. His spirit of
exploration led him to a new era of
development and brilliance.

279737.<center>だが……過ぎたるチカラは 破滅を招いた。: But... too much power leads to ruin.

279738.<center>急激な発展により 富とチカラを\n手にしたドワーフたちは 自らの:
The Dwarves, who had acquired wealth and power
through rapid development, could no longer
control their own desires.

279739.<center>欲に我を忘れ 他人から 奪い 蹴落とし……\n集落同士で 争うよ:
Lost in greed, they robbed others, kicked
others down the road...settlements began to
fight each other.

279740.<center>すでに 年老いてしまった 三闘士に\n民を 止めるチカラはなく\:
The old Triad had no power to stop the people,
and the conflict only intensified.

279741.<center>ある日のこと 数十年ぶりに\n閃光王カブが この地を 訪れた……:
One day, for the first time in decades, the
flash king Kabu visited this place...

279742.「ここんとこ 若いヤツらは 争ってばかりだ。\n どっちが 上だの下だの くだら:
These days, young people are always fighting.
I'm sick and tired of all this nonsense about
who's better or worse.

279743.「……ハハハッ オレが みんなを\n 穴ぐらから 連れださなければ\n ドワーフ:
If I hadn't taken everyone out of the cellar,
the Dwarves wouldn't be fighting each other.

279744.「オレの本当のきょうだいは 穴ぐらの中で\n 食べ物がなくて 飢えて 死んだんだ:
My real siblings died of hunger in the cellar
because there was no food. No one was there to
help me.

279745.「みんな 穴ぐらの外に出るのが 怖くて\n まだ小さかった 弟と妹を 見殺しにし:
They were so afraid to go out of their cellars
that they left their little brother and sister
to die. I couldn't forgive them.

279746.「オレは そんなヤツらを 見返したくて……\n ヤツらとオレは違うって 証明した:
I wanted to look them in the eye and prove
that I was different from them, so I ran out
of the cellar.

279747.「自分を信じて 突き進めば\n みんなが幸せに 生きられるって 信じてた。:
I believed that if I believed in myself and
pushed forward, everyone would live happily.

279748.「それなのに オレは いつの間にか\n ドワーフ同士で 争いあう\n 地獄を 作:
And yet I seem to have created a hell where
Dwarves fight each other.

279749.「なぁ イプチャルよ……。\n オレたちのしたことは 間違っていたのか？\n オ:
Hey, Yppchal... was it wrong what we did?
Because of me, they...

279750.<center>三闘士が この世を去った後……\n３つの大集落は ガテリア ウル:
After the Triad left this world the three
great settlements were renamed Gateria,
Urbea, and Dolworm.

279751.<center>そして ガテリアとウルベアの大戦争で\n多くのドワーフが 殺しあ:
And in the great war between Gateria and
Urbea, many Dwarves killed each other and
died...

279752.<center>三闘士は ドワーフの欲望と 争いの歴史に絶望し\nカルサドラ火山:
The Triad, in despair over the Dwarves' history of greed and strife, seeks to return the people to their primitive way of life by
consuming everything in the Calsadora Volcano's flames.

279753.「悪神となった三闘士を このまま\n 野放しにするわけには いきません。\n 山:
We cannot allow the Fiend Triad to remain
unchecked. Yppchal, the Mountain God. Is there
anything you can do?

279754.<center>彼らの心の闇を 祓うには\n絶望を凌駕するほどの 希望が必要とな:
To exorcise the darkness in their hearts,
we need hope that surpasses despair.

279755.<center>かつて ドワーフたちに希望をもたらした\n三闘士の武器と 同等の:
A sacred weapon with the same power as the weapons of the Triads, which once brought hope to the Dwarves, could shatter the despair of
the Triads.

279756.<center>ドワチャッカ大陸の未来のため この鉱石を託す。\n我のチカラを:
I entrust this ore to you for the future of Dwachakka Continent. With the ore that contains my power, you will be able to create
a sacred artifact that will bring hope.

279758.<center>神器を作るには\nウルベア帝国に伝わる 原初の炎……\nガテリア:
To make a sacred artifact you need the Origin
Flame in the Urbea Empire... and the secret
art of Gateria Empire...

279759.<center>そして ドルワーム王国に伝わる\n創造の炉が必要となる。３つのチ:
and the Life Furnace from the Dolworm
Kingdom. Now, the three must join forces
to save Dwachakka Continent...

279760.「手がかりが見つかったのは いいけれど……\n ウルベア帝国と ガテリア皇国は\:
It's good that you found clues, but the Urbea
Empire and the Gateria Empire are countries
that died out a long time ago.

279761.「原初の炎も秘伝の術も この世に存在しない。\n それに ドルワームでも 創造の:
Origin Flame and the secret arts do not exist in this world. And I've never heard of a Life Furnace, not even in Dolworm. How in the
world...

279762.「可能性は低いけど……ガテリアに関しては\n ひとつだけ 心当たりがある。\n:
It's unlikely, but I do know one thing about
Gateria. I'll try the secret technique.

279763.「<pc> あなたは ウルベアの\n 原初の炎について 調べてくれないかしら？\:
<pc> Would you be willing to do some
research on the Origin Flame of Urbea? I'm
sorry to be so unreasonable, but...

279764.「お互い 調査が終わったら\n ドルワーム水晶宮の玉座の間で 集合しましょ。\n:
When we have finished our research, let's meet
in the Throne Room of Dolworm Crystal Palace.
We can discuss the Life Furnace there.

279765.「大昔に 滅んでしまった国の宝を探すとは\n ずいぶんな 難題ですね。\n ……:
Finding the treasure of a country that died
out so long ago is quite a challenge, isn't
it? It would be impossible for anyone but you.

279766.「当時の ウルベアの王族なら 原初の炎について\n 何か知っているはず。……あな:
The royalty of Urbea back then must have known
something about the Origin Flame. ...you must
have an idea.

279767.「今こそ あなたの持つ 時渡りのチカラを使い\n ３０００年前の 古代ウルベア帝:
Now is the time to use your time-traveling powers to travel back 3,000 years to the ancient Urbea Empire. Let the impossible
become possible.

279768.ルーラストーンの メニューの中にある\nエテーネルキューブを使い\n３０００年前:
Use the Ethenel Cube in the menu of the
Zoomstone to get to the Urbea Empire Castle
3000 years ago.

279769.「どうも 気恥ずかしいねぇ こういうの……。\n あー あー……コホン。:
I'm so embarrassed about this... ah, ah...
ahem.

279770.「……原初の炎を 手にせし者よ。\n 我は 大地の三闘士がひとり\n 震天の槌:
You who hold the Origin Flame in your hand. I
am Nanna, the Hammer of Heaven, one of the
Earthen Triads.

279771.「この原初の炎は 開拓の旅の途中\n カルサドラ火山の火口にて 手に入れた聖火。:
This Origin Flame is a sacred fire received at the crater of Calsadora Volcano during our pioneering journey. It brought great
prosperity to our settlement.

279772.「だが 決して この繁栄に慢心してはならぬ。\n 畏れの心を忘れし者に 炎は牙を:
But never be too proud of this prosperity. For those who forget the spirit of fear, the flames will turn on their fangs and consume
everything in their path.

279773.「どうか この炎を 我が民を\n 正しき未来に導くため 使ってほしい。\n それ:
Please use this fire to lead my people to a
just future. That is what I desire...

279774.「ガーッハッハッハッハ！ いいぞぅ ナンナ！\n 威厳たっぷりの 王様って感じで:
Gahaha! Oh, yeah, Nanna! You're looking
really cool, with all the dignity of a king!

279775.「わわっ 兄ちゃん！\n まだ 撮ってるんだから しゃべっちゃダメっ！:
Whoa, brother! Don't talk! We're
still filming!

279776.「ちきしょーッ！ せっかく カッコつけてたのに\n 最後の最後で 台無しだよ！！:
Damn it! I was trying so hard to look cool...
but you ruined it at the last minute! You
stupid brother!

279777.「……今のお方が １０００年前\n ドワチャッカ大陸を開拓し 我がウルベア帝国の:
The person you see today, who pioneered the Dwachakka Continent a thousand years ago, and laid the foundation of our Urbea Empire. The
Heavenshaker, Nanna.

279778.「武勇ばかりが 目立って 伝えられておるが\n 民を愛し 集落の発展のため\n:
Although her military prowess is the only thing that stands out in the legend, she loved her people and did more than anyone for the
development of the community.

279779.「幼いころ 父上から\n ナンナ様の伝説を 数多く聞いてのう……。\n 彼女のよ:
When I was a child, my father told me many
legends about Lady Nanna and I longed to be a
king like her.

279780.「この原初の炎は ウルベアの発展を支えた秘宝。\n これがあったおかげで 我が帝:
This Origin Flame is the hidden treasure that has sustained Urbea's development. Thanks to it, our empire became the greatest on the
continent.

279782.「そちも知っての通り 先の大戦で\n 我が国は ガテリア皇国を滅ぼした。\n 我:
As you know, our country destroyed Gateria in
the last war. We have made a great mistake.

279783.「多くのドワーフが殺しあい……死んでいった。\n もし あの光景を ナンナ様が見:
Many Dwarves killed each other and died. If
Nanna could have seen that scene, she would
have been devastated.

279784.「だから わらわは 民に誓ったのじゃ。: That is why I swore to the people.

279785.「ゆがんだ時代を正し 思いなかばに\n 散っていった者たちが 託した未来を\n:
We will correct the distortions of the times, and hold firmly in our hands the future entrusted to us by those who died in the midst
of their dreams...

279786.「あのような悲劇を 二度と生むことのない\n 新たな時代 新たなウルベアを築くと:
We will build a new Urbea, a new era, where
such a tragedy will never happen again.

279787.「いや……ウルベアだけではない。\n わらわは わらわのすべてを\n このドワチ:
No...not just Urbea. I will devote all of my
straw to this Dwachakka Continent.

279788.「すべての民を この大陸を\n わらわは 一生をかけて 守ってみせる。:
I will defend all peoples and this continent
for the rest of my life.

279789.「ひとつだけ 聞かせてほしい。\n これは この大陸の未来のため\n 必要なこと:
Let me ask you one thing. Is this necessary
for the future of this continent?
<yesno><close>

279790.「よろしい。ウルベアの英雄である そちになら\n 安心して この炎を 託すことが:
Very well. You are the hero of Urbea, and to
you I can safely entrust this flame. Take it.

279792.「わらわの知らない場所で\n そちは 戦ってくれておるのじゃな。\n ドワチャッ:
You are fighting a war in a place I do not
know. I look forward to your support for the
future of Dwachakka.

279793.原初の炎を 手に入れたので\n現代の ドルワーム王国 水晶宮の\n玉座の間へ 向:
Now that we have received the Origin Flame,
let's head to the throne Room of the Crystal
Palace in modern Dolworm Kingdom.

279794.「おかえりなさい。\n 原初の炎のことは 何かわかった……？:
Welcome back. Did you find out anything about
the Origin Flame...?

279795.チリに 原初の炎を 渡しますか？<yesno><close>:
Would you give the Origin Flame to Chiri?
<yesno><close>

279796.「……なーんか 怪しいわね。\n もしかして 何か 隠したりしてない？:
That's a little suspicious. Are you hiding
something?

279797.チリに 原初の炎を 渡しますか？<yesno><close>:
Would you give the Origin Flame to Chiri?
<yesno><close>

279798.「これが ウルベア帝国に伝わるという秘宝\n 原初の炎……！ いったい どうやっ:
This is the treasure of the Urbea Empire, the
Origin Flame...! How in the world did you get
this?

279799.「……いいえ。あなたは いつだって\n 不可能を 可能にしてきたものね。\n 何:
No. You've always done the impossible. Maybe
nothing is a mystery.

279800.「そうそう。こっちも\n 強力な助っ人を 呼んできたの！\n ふふっ……誰だと:
Yes, yes. I've called in some powerful helpers
over here, too! Guess who?

279801.「おおお！ 懐かしき戦友 <pc>よ！\n 久しぶりであるな！:
Oooooh! My old comrade-in-arms
<pc>! Long time no see!

279802.「余は かのガテリア皇国の 正統なる継承者\n 第一の皇子 ビャン・ダオ！:
I am Byan Dao, the rightful heir to the throne
of Gateria, the First Prince of Gateria!

279803.「チリから ドワチャッカ大陸の一大事と\n しらせを受けてな。急ぎ\n 遺跡の調:
I received word from Chiri that a major event
had occurred on the Dwachakka Continent. I
returned from an urgent survey of the ruins.

279804.「すでに 話は聞きおよんでおる。\n イプチャル神の鉱石を 加工するため\n 我:
I have already heard the story. They say that
you need the secret of Gateria to process
Yppchal's Ore.

279805.「この巻物は ガテリア皇国の王族に\n 伝わる秘宝……。３０００年前から\n 余:
This scroll, a treasure of the royal family of
Gateria, has been in my possession for 3,000
years.

279806.「ここには ガテリアの技術のすべて……\n 三闘士の神器の材料とされる\n 鉱石:
Here, it describes all of Gateria's techniques
for processing the ore from which the Triad's
sacred artifacts are made.

279807.「本来ならば ガテリアの王族以外の者の\n 閲覧は 固く 禁じられておるが……:
By law, the viewing of this scroll is strictly
forbidden to anyone outside of Gateria's royal
family.

279808.「そちを始め この時代で知り合った\n 大切な友人たちを 守るためならば\n こ:
I, Byan Dao, am willing to help protect you
and all the friends I have made in this time
and age!

279809.「これで ウルベアの原初の炎\n ガテリアの秘術は そろった……。\n 残るは:
Now that we have all the secrets of Gateria
and Urbea's Origin Flame ... all that remains
is the Life Furnace of Dolworm Kingdom...

279811.「……創造の炉は 確かに\n このドルワームに 存在する。:
Life Furnace is indeed present in this
Dolworm.

279812.「お前たちが その存在を知らぬのは無理もない。\n ドルワームの 代々の王にのみ:
It is not surprising that you do not know of its existence. It is a law passed down orally only from generation to generation of kings of
Dolworm, and its existence is concealed.

279813.「炉への道を 開けるのは\n 太陽の石をあつかえる 王族の者のみ……。\n 今こ:
Only those of royalty who have access to the
sun stone can open the way to the furnace...
now is the time to open the way.

279814.「太陽の石のチカラを使い\n そなたたちに 炉におもむく\n 資格を 与えた。:
I used the power of the sun stone to qualify
you to visit the furnace.

279815.「水晶宮の４階 神カラクリの横にある\n 操作盤をしらべ 創造の炉へ 向かうのだ:
You will find a control panel on the fourth floor of the Crystal Palace, next to the Divine Machine, and go to the Life Furnace.
I'll explain everything there.

279818.「４０００年前 ドルワームの礎を築いたとされる\n 賢哲王ドルタム様の手によって:
It was created 4,000 years ago by the Wise
King Doltam, who is said to have laid the
foundation of Dolworm.

279819.「太陽の石の 膨大なエネルギーを 用いることで\n どんな鉱石をも 加工すること:
By harnessing the tremendous energy of the sun's stones, any ore can be processed. There is nothing that cannot be created in this
furnace.

279820.「三闘士の神器をはじめ ドワーフたちの\n 文明を支える 様々なものが\n 創造:
From the Life Furnace came the sacred artifacts of the Triad, as well as various other items that supported the civilization of
the Dwarves.

279821.「だが……やがて この炉によって\n 人殺しの道具までもが 作られるように\n:
But... this furnace was eventually used to
make tools for killing people.

279822.「誰よりも 争いごとを嫌っていた \n 心優しきドルタム様は 事態を憂い\n こ:
The kind-hearted Master Doltam, who hated strife more than anyone, was so concerned about the situation that he sealed this
furnace deep beneath the village.

279823.「悪しき心を持つ者に 利用されぬよう\n 代々の王にのみ 創造の炉の存在は伝えら:
The existence of the Life Furnace has been hidden for a long time, passed down only to successive kings, so that it could not be used
by those with evil hearts.

279824.「……だが 今は そんなことを\n 言っていられる状況ではない。\n 代々の王も:
But now is not the time for such talk. I'm
sure the kings of the past will forgive me.

279825.「今こそ ドワチャッカ大陸を救うため\n ３つのチカラを 合わせるとき。\n 創:
Now is the time to combine the power of the three to save Dwachakka Continent. We must use the Life Furnace to complete the sacred
artifact!

279828.「武器ではなく クワの形にしたのは\n 三闘士が 人々と共に 大地を開拓した際\:
The reason we chose the shape of a hoe instead of a weapon is based on the legend that the Earthen Triads used hoes when they
pioneered the land with the people.

279831.「三国を代表し ドルワーム王国の者が\n そのクワを扱うべきだと 私は思います。:
I think that the hoe should be handled by a representative of the three kingdoms and the Dolworm Kingdom. Miss Chiri... will you come
with us?

279834.「覚えておるかの？ \n ウルベア魔神兵の中にあった\n リウ老師から 受け継い:
Do you remember it? It was one of the seeds
that Master Liu passed down to me in Urbea
Aztech.

279835.「あれから このタネを 誠心誠意\n 愛情をこめて 育ててな……。\n やっと:
Since then, I've been nurturing these seeds
with all my heart and love... and finally,
I've been able to make them grow this far.

279836.「我が祖国 ガテリアの希望の象徴じゃ。\n これがあれば 災いを起こしているとい:
It is a symbol of hope for our homeland,
Gateria. Perhaps it will comfort Master Kabu
that we are causing mischief.

279844.<pc>たちは\n三闘士たちに対抗するための 神器づくりに\n寝る間も惜しんで:
<pc> and their companions worked
tirelessly, even losing sleep, to create the
sacred treasure to use against the Triad...

279845.「これこそ ドルワーム ガテリア ウルベアの\n チカラを結集して作った神器……:
This is the divine instrument that Dolworm,
Gateria, and Urbea have combined their powers
to create... the Hope Plant!

279846.「未来と希望を 切り拓くための神器……。\n これなら きっと！:
A sacred instrument to open up the future and
hope... this will do it!

279847.「そのクワには 三国の……\n ドワチャッカ大陸の未来を 想う者たちの\n 尊い:
The hoe is filled with the precious wishes of
those who think of the future of the three
countries and Dwachakka Continent.

279848.「チリ。\n 僕たちは ここで 信じて待ってる。\n ドワチャッカの未来を よろ:
Chiri. We'll be here waiting for you,
believing in you. We're looking forward to
seeing what the future holds for Dwachakka!

279851.「さぁ カルサドラ火山へ 向かいましょう。\n 三闘士様たちの 深い絶望を\n:
Now, let us head for Calsadora Volcano. I will
crush the deep despair of the Triads with this
Hope Plant!

279852.「お願いです ナンナ様！\n ドワチャッカ大陸を 滅びから救うため\n チカラを:
Please, Lady Nanna! Please help us save
Dwachakka Continent from extinction!

279853.「ったく うるさいねぇ。\n アタシのことは ほっといてくれって\n 言ってるだ:
What a pain in the ass. I told you to leave me
alone...

279854.「アタシたちの願いは カルサドラ火山を\n 噴火させ 二度と争いが起こらないよう:
Our wish is to erupt Calsadora Volcano and
return this continent to its pristine form so
that there will never again be conflict...

279855.「それが 三闘士の……兄者の望みなんだ。\n 他でもない 兄者がそう望むなら\n:
That is what the Triads...and you, my brother,
want. If you, of all people, wish it, I will
gladly obey you!

279856.「……アンタらは 知ってんだろ？\n 兄者の作った国……ガテリアの末路を。\n:
You know, don't you? You know what happened to
Gateria, the land of my brother. His country
was destroyed by Urbea.

279857.「アタシの民が……兄者の愛した国を！ 民を！\n すべてを殺し 踏みにじったんだ:
My people... the country you loved! My people!
They killed everything and trampled on
everything! How could I ever forgive them?

279858.「それは のちの子孫が 引き起こしたこと。\n あなたの落ち度では ありません！:
It was caused by your later descendants. It is
not your fault! So...

279859.「……だまれぇぇぇぇッ！！\n アンタに アタシたちの何がわかるッ！？: Shut up! What do you know about us?

279860.「アンタらなんかに アタシたちの……！\n 兄者の悲しみが……痛みが\n わかっ:
You don't understand our sorrow...! You don't
understand our grief... our pain...!

279861.「どんなに 裏切られようが！\n 兄者は 大陸の民を 誰よりも愛し\n 死ぬ直前:
No matter how they betrayed him! He loved the people of the continent more than anyone and believed in them right up to the moment of his
death...

279862.「アタシが……アタシの国が……\n そんな兄者の想いを つぶしちまった。\n 取:
I... my country... crushed my brother's
feelings. I have done something irrevocable.

279863.「今のアタシたちが 間違ってることくらい\n 本当は わかってる……わかってるん:
I know that we are wrong now, I know that!
But... but...!

279864.「止めどない 憤怒と絶望が\n ずっと アタシを 責めつづける……。\n どうし:
Unstoppable anger and despair...
You keep blaming me all the time...
I don't know what to do...!

279868.「姉ちゃん……ウルベアは ガテリアを滅ぼした。\n だけどね ガテリアのすべてが:
Sis...Urbea destroyed Gateria. But hey, not
all is lost in Gateria.

279869.「この苗や そのクワを作った技術のように\n 今も 確かに 生きつづけるものがあ:
There are things that live on today, like
these seedlings and the technology used to
make the hoe. In our Dwachakka Continent...

279870.「だからこそ 兄ちゃんを 止めなくちゃ。\n 兄ちゃんの愛した民を 大地を 希望:
That's why I have to stop you. You can't let
the people you love, the earth, and its hopes
crumble in your own hands.

279871.「そうなったら 兄ちゃんは\n 今よりも もっともっと\n 苦しむことに なるか:
If that happens, you'll suffer even more than
you do now...

279872.「……ハハッ ざまぁないね。\n 姉貴分として アンタの前では\n 情けない姿な:
...Haha, that's fine. I didn't want to
appear pathetic in front of you as a big
sister.

279873.「なぁ その苗さ……\n アタシが 持っててもいいかい？:
Hey, that seedling... do you mind if I keep
it?

279874.「お願いだ。\n アタシに 勇気を……。\n 前に進むためのチカラを 分けてくれ:
Please. Give me the courage... the power to
move forward...!

279875.「……兄者は この先にいる。\n 行こう <pc>！\n アタシたちの手で この:
...my brother is just up ahead. Let's go
<pc>! With our own hands, we will end
this nightmare!

280859.「よう……思ったより 早かったじゃねぇか。\n ……<cs_pchero>。:
Hey...that was quicker than I thought it would
be. ...<cs_pchero>.

280860.「見ろよ このながめ……。\n これが オレの望む 新たな世界の姿だ。:
Look at this view... this is the new world I
want to see.

280861.「オレが 外に連れだしちまったから\n ドワーフ同士で 殺しあうなんて\n バカ:
I took them out there, and all those stupid
Dwarves killing each other...

280862.「前に進まなければ 希望さえ持たなければ……\n 何も 起こりはしない。オレの民:
If we don't move forward, if we don't have
hope... nothing will happen. My people can
live in peace and not in strife.

280863.「オレは！ オレの犯した 過ちを正す。\n 争いの歴史と 争いのもととなるすべて:
I am! I will right my wrongs. I will burn the history of war and everything that has caused it, and I will return this continent to its
pristine form!

280864.「それがッ！ ドワチャッカ大陸の\n 新たな神となる オレたちの初仕事ってわけだ:
That's it! We are the new gods of Dwachakka
Continent, and this is our first job! Ha-ha-
ha-ha!

280865.「兄者！ もうやめるんだ……！\n こんなことしても どうにもならないんだ！\n:
Brother! Stop it! This is not helping! Come to
your senses!

280866.「おっ どこ行ってたんだよ お前ら！\n どっか消えたと 思ったらさ……。\n:
Whoa! Where the hell have you been? I thought
you disappeared... hey, why are you looking at
me like that?

280867.「大勢のドワーフが 殺しあった……。\n オレのせいで ドワチャッカ大陸は\n:
So many Dwarves killed each other that
Dwachakka Continent was destroyed because of
me.

280868.「オレは……オレは……\n みんなのことを 幸せにしたかったのに\n この大陸を:
I...I...I wanted to make everyone happy, but I
turned this continent into hell.

280869.「弟をッ！ 妹をッ！\n 見殺しにしたヤツらのほうが 正しかったんだ。\n 穴ぐ:
My brother! My sister! They were right to
leave them to die. If I never got out of that
cellar...

280870.「……そうだ！\n 外の世界に 夢さえ見なければ\n こんなことには ならなかっ:
That's right! If only I hadn't dreamed of the
outside world, none of this would have
happened!

280871.「オレは オレ自身を 許せないッ！\n 愛する民のために オレは オレの過ちを…:
I cannot forgive myself! For the sake of my
beloved people, I will burn this continent to
the ground for my mistakes!

280874.「ア……アア……！ 抑エラレナイ……！\n 我ラノ絶望 我ラノ憤怒\n 炎トナリ:
Ah... ah...! I can't hold back. My despair, my
fury, my flames, they will consume
everything...

280875.「アハハッ！ ドワチャッカ大陸ヲ 火ノ海ニ。\n 何モカモ ブッツブースッ！:
Ahahaha! Dwachakka Continent to a sea
of fire!

280876.「我ラノ過チヲ 正スベシ……。\n スベテハ 愛スル民ノタメニッ！！！:
We must right our wrongs... for the sake of
the people we love!

280877.「ふざけたこと 言わないで！\n そんなこと 絶対に させないわ！: Don't be ridiculous! I won't let you do it!

280879.「悪神よ 貴様の思い通りには させぬ！\n その憤怒 ここで断たせてもらう！:
Fiend, I will not let you have your way! I
will not allow your wrath to be unleashed!

280880.「三闘士全員が 完全に\n 呪炎に 飲まれてしまったようですね……。\n 手強い:
It seems that all the Triads have been
completely consumed by the Fiend's Flame... a
formidable opponent! Be careful!

280881.「クッ…… なんという執念。\n これでは 呪炎を切り離せない……！:
What persistence...! This is not going to cut
off the Fiend's Flame...!

280882.「オレノ 過 チ……。\n ス ベテ 焼キ 尽クス……。\n スベテ ハ 民ノ:
My excesses... will be burned away... for the
sake of my people. For the sake of the people.

280883.「いいかげんに……目を 覚ましなさいッ！！\n この 大バカ者ッッッ！！！: For God's sake... wake up! You stupid idiot!

280884.「たしかに 私たち ドワーフは\n 自らの欲に 目がくらみ\n 愚かな争いを 続:
Yes, we Dwarves have been fighting each other
foolishly, blinded by our own greed...

280885.「歴史上幾度も 争いが くり返され\n ドワーフ同士で 殺しあってきた。:
There have been many wars throughout history,
and the Dwarves have killed each other.

280886.「あなたたちから 見れば\n 私たちの歴史は いびつで\n ひどく 醜いものかも:
From your point of view, our history may be a
little bit weird and terribly ugly...

280887.「けれど これが！ 私たちの歴史なのッ！！: But this! This is our history!

280888.「あなたたち三闘士が 希望を与えてくれたから\n 多くの間違いを犯し もがき 苦:
You Triads gave us hope so that our
predecessors, despite their many mistakes and
struggles, could move forward.

280889.「あなたたちがくれた 希望を！\n 私たちが 歩んできた この歴史を……\n 否:
The hope you gave us! I will not allow you to
deny the history that we have made!

280890.「これは ガテリアの民が残した希望だ。\n どれだけ 踏みつけられても 決して潰:
This is the hope left by the people of Gateria. No matter how much they trample on it, it will never be crushed. Pretty gutsy,
don't you think?

280891.「ボクらの民は 兄ちゃんが思うほど 弱くない。\n どんな絶望的な状況に陥ったっ:
Our people are not as weak as you think. No
matter how hopeless the situation, we can move
forward again and again with hope!

280892.「お願い キミの手で……未来を 切り拓いて！\n 絶望の大地に 希望の花を 咲か:
Please, with your hands... open up the future!
Let flowers of hope bloom in this land of
despair!

280893.「閃光王カブよ。\n この花が ドワチャッカの……\n 私たちドワーフの 希望の:
Kabu, the King of the Flashes. This
flower is Dwachakka's... our Dwarf's form of
hope!

280894.「希望……コレガ オレタチガ\n ズット 追イ求メテイタ ヒ…カリ……。: Hope... this is what we've been looking for.

280895.「希望の光で 悪神の憤怒が 抑え込まれている！\n ……今です！ 神剣レクタリス:
The light of hope, the wrath of the fiends is being stifled! ...now! With the Divine Sword Lectalis, cut away all the Triad's Fiend's
Flame!

280897.「へへへっ！\n お前の説教 ガツンと効いたぜ。\n ずいぶん骨のある 嬢ちゃん:
Heh heh heh! Your sermon really hit
home. You've got some backbone, girl!

280898.「現代のドワチャッカ大陸に生きる 娘よ。\n 我の過ちを正し 救ってくれたこと\:
My daughter, living in the modern Dwachakka
Continent. I thank you from the bottom of my
heart for righting my wrongs and saving me.

280899.「穴ぐらの外の世界で……\n お前たちが 紡いでいく未来を\n 楽しみにしている:
I look forward to the future you will weave
for yourselves in the world outside the
cellar.

280900.「ガッハッハッ！ まーた\n お前に 助けられちまったな。\n さっすが オレた:
Gah! You saved me again. That's our
<cs_pchero>!

280901.「まったく 調子に乗んじゃないよ。\n この……バカ兄者！ みんなに\n どんだ:
Don't get carried away. You... stupid
brother! Do you have any idea how much trouble
you've caused everyone?

280902.「へ へへ……。大暴れしたからか\n なんだか 疲れちまった。\n 身体に チカ:
Hehehe... I'm kind of tired from the rampage.
I can't get any energy into my body...

280903.「オレたちは フォーリオンに戻って\n いったん 眠ることにする…ぜ……。\n:
We're going back to Fourion to get some
sleep... thanks... <cs_pchero>.

280904.「……三闘士が 神化の儀に挑んだのは\n 故郷である ドワチャッカ大陸を\n 守:
...The reason why the Triads challenged the
ritual of apotheosis was to protect their
hometown, Dwachakka Continent.

280905.「そんな 尊い願いを……\n このようなモノで ゆがめるなんて\n 絶対に 許せ:
I will not allow such a noble wish to be
distorted by something like this...!

280906.「……ユーライザさん。\n さっきは かばってくれて ありがとう。\n あなたは:
Ms. Yuliza. Thank you for covering for me
earlier. You saved my life.

280907.「べ 別に……\n 礼を 言われるほどのことは\n していませんので……！:
I haven't done anything to warrant a thank
you...!

280908.「私たちの未来……か。\n この花のように 希望あふれるものに\n なれば いい:
Our future.... I hope it will be as hopeful as
this flower.

280909.「ううん。私たちの手で そうしていかなきゃね。\n 三闘士様が愛した この大陸を:
No. We have to do it with our own
hands. We must protect this continent that
Triad loved for a long, long time.

280910.「これで 火山の噴火は 止められたみたいね。\n ふふっ ドワチャッカ大陸を 救:
Looks like we stopped the volcano from
erupting. Phew, thank you so much for saving
Dwachakka Continent! <cs_pchero>!

280911.「さて！ 私は 研究員のみんなを連れて\n ドルワーム水晶宮に 戻るわ。あなたは:
Well! I'm going back to Dolworm Crystal Palace
with all the researchers. You will report to
the King in the Throne Room!

282312.<center>我が名は 山神イプチャル。\nアクロニア鉱山に 恵みを与え\nこ:
My name is Yppchal, God of the Mountains. I am
the one who blessed the Acronia Mine and
watched over the Dwarves of this land.

290518.「……まったく こんなときに\n 冗談を言うものでは ないぞよ？\n この大陸の:
...you can't be joking at a time like this,
can you? This is necessary for the future of
this continent, is it not? <yesno><close>
